import React from 'react'; import BackButton from './BackButton'; const SettingPanel = ({handleTimer, timerLength, setTimerLength, workBreak, handleClickSettings, setWorkBreak }) => { const applySettings = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setTimerLength(e.target.pomodoro.value) setWorkBreak(e.target.workBreak.value) } return (
) } export default SettingPanel;
